alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 10:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Campbell and west central Crook Counties through 1045 AM MDT... At 1015 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Weston, or 30 miles northeast of Gillette, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oshoto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
